title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
SR: To reproduce the issue, add the following line to StyledText performPaint method and observe the redraws: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
